paragraphs.content: Chapter 15
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 15

paragraphs.content: I am the true vine, and my Father is the husbandman.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am the true vine, and my Father is the husbandman.

paragraphs.content: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away: and every branch that beareth fruit, he purgeth it, that it may bring forth more fruit.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away: and every branch that beareth fruit, he purgeth it, that it may bring forth more fruit.

paragraphs.content: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you.

paragraphs.content: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me.

paragraphs.content: I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.

paragraphs.content: If a man abide not in me, he is cast forth as a branch, and is withered; and men gather them, and cast them into the fire, and they are burned.
paragraphs.contentHtml: If a man abide not in me, he is cast forth as a branch, and is withered; and men gather them, and cast them into the fire, and they are burned.

paragraphs.content: If ye abide in me, and my words abide in you, ye shall ask what ye will, and it shall be done unto you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: If ye abide in me, and my words abide in you, ye shall ask what ye will, and it shall be done unto you.

paragraphs.content: Herein is my Father glorified, that ye bear much fruit; so shall ye be my disciples.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Herein is my Father glorified, that ye bear much fruit; so shall ye be my disciples.

paragraphs.content: As the Father hath loved me, so have I loved you: continue ye in my love.
paragraphs.contentHtml: As the Father hath loved me, so have I loved you: continue ye in my love.

paragraphs.content: If ye keep my commandments, ye shall abide in my love; even as I have kept my Father’s commandments, and abide in his love.
paragraphs.contentHtml: If ye keep my commandments, ye shall abide in my love; even as I have kept my Father’s commandments, and abide in his love.

paragraphs.content: These things have I spoken unto you, that my joy might remain in you, and that your joy might be full.
paragraphs.contentHtml: These things have I spoken unto you, that my joy might remain in you, and that your joy might be full.

paragraphs.content: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.

paragraphs.content: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.

paragraphs.content: Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.

paragraphs.content: Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.

paragraphs.content: Ye have not chosen me, but I have chosen you, and ordained you, that ye should go and bring forth fruit, and that your fruit should remain: that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name, he may give it you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ye have not chosen me, but I have chosen you, and ordained you, that ye should go and bring forth fruit, and that your fruit should remain: that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name, he may give it you.

paragraphs.content: These things I command you, that ye love one another.
paragraphs.contentHtml: These things I command you, that ye love one another.

paragraphs.content: If the world hate you, ye know that it hated me before it hated you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: If the world hate you, ye know that it hated me before it hated you.

paragraphs.content: If ye were of the world, the world would love his own: but because ye are not of the world, but I have chosen you out of the world, therefore the world hateth you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: If ye were of the world, the world would love his own: but because ye are not of the world, but I have chosen you out of the world, therefore the world hateth you.

paragraphs.content: Remember the word that I said unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord. If they have persecuted me, they will also persecute you; if they have kept my saying, they will keep yours also.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Remember the word that I said unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord. If they have persecuted me, they will also persecute you; if they have kept my saying, they will keep yours also.

paragraphs.content: But all these things will they do unto you for my name’s sake, because they know not him that sent me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But all these things will they do unto you for my name’s sake, because they know not him that sent me.

paragraphs.content: If I had not come and spoken unto them, they had not had sin: but now they have no cloak for their sin.
paragraphs.contentHtml: If I had not come and spoken unto them, they had not had sin: but now they have no cloak for their sin.

paragraphs.content: He that hateth me hateth my Father also.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He that hateth me hateth my Father also.

paragraphs.content: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did, they had not had sin: but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father.
paragraphs.contentHtml: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did, they had not had sin: but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father.

paragraphs.content: But this cometh to pass, that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law, They hated me without a cause.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But this cometh to pass, that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law, They hated me without a cause.

paragraphs.content: But when the Comforter is come, whom I will send unto you from the Father, even the Spirit of truth, which proceedeth from the Father, he shall testify of me:
paragraphs.contentHtml: But when the Comforter is come, whom I will send unto you from the Father, even the Spirit of truth, which proceedeth from the Father, he shall testify of me:

paragraphs.content: And ye also shall bear witness, because ye have been with me from the beginning.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And ye also shall bear witness, because ye have been with me from the beginning.
